Articles.Content: My idea for this would add animal pods in the science tab. There would be multiple animals like dogs, cats, and chimps. You would get an IVA camera that shows the animal's face and stuff in it's pod. You would have multiple experiments like giving the cat some yarn, or letting the dog float free for a few minutes. Maybe there could also be pet modules for the kerbals.
Well, there is Krak... science

i'm not sure about: "There would be multiple animals like dogs, cats, and chimps. You would get an IVA camera that shows the animal's face and stuff in it's pod. You would have multiple experiments like giving the cat some yarn, or letting the dog float free for a few minutes. Maybe there could also be pet modules for the kerbals.", but this is the closest i can find: https://spacedock.info/mod/2195/Critter Mod

Edited May 6, 2022 by Space Kerbalisation Tech
Try KNES, it's an esa pack that contains a cat science pod as well as other stuff!
always makes me think of this.
